Aegis.effect: Reduces damage inflicted by attacks from foes 2 spaces away by 50%.
Aegis.name: Aegis

Aether.effect: Resolve combat as if foe suffered Def/Res-50%. Unit recovers HP = half damage dealt.
Aether.name: Aether

Blazing Flame.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in an area near target take damage equal to unit's 1.5xAtk minus foe's Def or Res.
Blazing Flame.name: Blazing Flame

Blazing Light.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in an area near target take damage equal to unit's 1.5xAtk minus foe's Def or Res.
Blazing Light.name: Blazing Light

Blazing Thunder.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).
Blazing Thunder.name: Blazing Thunder

Blazing Wind.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in an area near target take damage equal to unit's 1.5xAtk minus foe's Def or Res.
Blazing Wind.name: Blazing Wind

Bonfire.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 50% of unit's Def.
